scripts.deploy:clean: aws s3 rm s3://$(cat ../infra/cdk.out/params.json | jq -r '.InfraStack | with_entries(select(.key|match(".*WebsiteBucketName[a-zA-Z0-9_]+"))) | to_entries | map([.value])[0][0]') --recursive
scripts.deploy:sync: aws s3 sync build/ s3://$(cat ../infra/cdk.out/params.json | jq -r '.InfraStack | with_entries(select(.key|match(".*WebsiteBucketName[a-zA-Z0-9_]+"))) | to_entries | map([.value])[0][0]') --exclude uploads
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:clean && npm run deploy:sync
scripts.deploy:invalidateCache: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --paths "/index.html" --distribution-id $(cat ../infra/cdk.out/params.json | jq -r '.InfraStack | with_entries(select(.key|match(".*DistributionId[a-zA-Z0-9_]+"))) | to_entries | map([.value])[0][0]')
